thread.title: BRIEF-Unifor Reaches Tentative Agreement With New Flyer

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Unifor Reaches Tentative Agreement With New Flyer

organizations.name: new flyer  new flyer industries inc

text:
March 29 (Reuters) - New Flyer Industries Inc:
* UNIFOR REACHES TENTATIVE AGREEMENT WITH NEW FLYER * UNIFOR - WHEN RATIFIED, COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT WILL COVER PERIOD FROM APRIL 1, 2018 TO JUNE 30, 2022
* UNIFOR - UNIFOR LOCAL 3003 REPRESENTS 750 NEW FLYER WORKERS IN PRODUCTION, SKILLED TRADES, AND INSPECTION
* UNIFOR - UNIFOR LOCAL 3003 MEMBERS WILL VOTE ON RATIFYING TENTATIVE AGREEMENT ON APRIL 8
* UNIFOR- LOCAL 3003 SUCCEEDED IN GETTING ANNUAL WAGE INCREASES,MAINTAINED DEFINED BENEFIT PENSION PLAN,INCREASED EMPLOYER-PAID COVERAGE ON SOME BENEFITS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
